targets.expr: sum by (tenant) (prometheus_tsdb_head_series{env="$environment", tenant!~"|default-tenant"})
sum by (tenant) (prometheus_tsdb_head_series{env="ops", tenant!~"|default-tenant"}) / sum by (tenant) (thanos_receive_head_series_limit{env="ops", tenant!~"|default-tenant"}) * 100
sum by (tenant, code) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", namespace="$namespace", handler="receive" }[$interval]))
sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", namespace="$namespace", handler="receive"}[$interval]))

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled incoming requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", namespace="$namespace", handler="receive",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", namespace="$namespace", handler="receive"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle incoming requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", namespace="$namespace", handler="receive"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", namespace="$namespace", handler="receive"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", namespace="$namespace", handler="receive"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

targets.expr: sum by (tenant, code) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate of write requests (by tenant and code)

targets.expr: sum by (tenant, code) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Number of errors (by tenant and code)

targets.expr: sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, tenant) (http_request_duration_seconds_count{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive"})

sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_count{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Average successful HTTP request size (per tenant and code, only 2XX)

targets.expr: sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_count{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Average failed HTTP request size (per tenant and code, non 2XX)

targets.expr: sum by (job, tenant, method) (http_inflight_requests{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive"})
sum(rate(thanos_receive_write_timeseries_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (job, tenant)

panels.title: Rate of series received (per tenant, only 2XX)

targets.expr: sum(rate(thanos_receive_write_timeseries_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (tenant, code)

panels.title: Rate of series not written (per tenant and code, non 2XX)

targets.expr: sum(rate(thanos_receive_write_samples_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (job, tenant)

panels.title: Rate of samples received (per tenant, only 2XX)

targets.expr: sum(rate(thanos_receive_write_samples_sum{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (tenant, code)

panels.title: Rate of samples not written (per tenant and code, non 2XX)

panels.description: Shows rate of replications to other receive nodes.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_receive_replications_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of replications to other receive nodes.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_receive_replications_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", result="error"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_receive_replications_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of forwarded requests to other receive nodes.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_receive_forward_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of forwareded requests to other receive nodes.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_receive_forward_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", result="error"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_receive_forward_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows the relative time of last successful upload to the object-store bucket.

targets.expr: time() - max by (job, bucket) (thanos_objstore_bucket_last_successful_upload_time{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"})

panels.title: Successful Upload

targets.expr: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[30s])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[30s])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}
go_goroutines{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}
go_gc_duration_seconds{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}
